column5: Relaxation awaits you nestled in this private elegantly furnished home;  20 minutes from all major attractions. Full kitchen with coffee/condiments. Enjoy the outside under the arbor or on the large patio listening to the birds in this established neighborhood. Private covered parking accessible by a gate opener. There is one permanent RV under the carport, but room for up to a 31' RV next to it. For an additional nightly fee invite your traveling friends and plug in to water/electric hookups.
